*_1. Click on "Force.com Platform", and select "AppExchange" option._*

*_2. On the "Finds Apps" section, write "Projectforce" and press the Enter key. _*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install2.jpg

*_3. Click on "ProjectForce Beta" link._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install3.jpg

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install4.jpg

*_5. Choose "Production" option, and click on "OK" button._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install5.jpg

*_6. Enter your UserName, Password and click on "Login" button._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install6.jpg

*_7. Check "I have read and agree..." option._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install7.jpg

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install8.jpg

*_9. Enter your password, and click on "Submit" button._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install9.jpg

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install10.jpg

*_11. Click on "Next" button._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install11.jpg

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install12.jpg

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install13.jpg

*_14. Click on "Setup" link at the top of the page._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install14.jpg

*_15. In App Setup section, click on "Create" option._*

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install15.JPG

http://discussionforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install16.JPG
